<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[The Harder They Fall (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1788) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You make your foes fall painfully when you trip them. When you successfully [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) foe, your target takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage. On a critical success, the target takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage plus your sneak attack damage.
name: The Harder They Fall (Rogue)
